column4: Is there a programme of instant messaging or theme, with the interface similar to Windows Live? I do not like much of aMSN.
Is there a programme of instant messaging or theme, with the interface similar to Windows Live? I do not like much of aMSN.
I don't know much about IM clients.  I used Pidgin becauseI can log into EVERYTHING at once, and it is under active development. heheheh
